name: labor_parameter_sf1
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(labor_parameter_sf1:[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(SafeView Factor (Max quanity of Monitors in One Station))*>,Single)){0.6}{[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(SafeView Factor (Max quanity of Monitors in One Station))*>,Dual)){1}{[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(SafeView Factor (Max quanity of Monitors in One Station))*>,Triple)){1.2}{[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(SafeView Factor (Max quanity of Monitors in One Station))*>,Quad/Orion)){1.4}{[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(SafeView Factor (Max quanity of Monitors in One Station))*>,Combination of Safeview configurations)){1.5}{0}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
description:
If svf = Single, SF = 0.6
Else If svf = Dual, SF = 1,
Else If svf = Triple, SF = 1.2,
Else If svf = Quad, SF = 1.4,
Else If svf = Combination of Safeview configurations, SF = 1.5
